issue.title: Cached models lose server and name information

content.raw:
Just some thoughts about storing model using its human readable name:

* Windows (assuming we intend to support this OS in the future) tend to have more restrictions on what characters are allowed in filenames so the human readable names will now be subject to these restrictions. 

* A few disk formats outside of the linux world are case insensitive so models with human readable names like `My Model` and `my model` will not be able to live side by side in the same directory - not sure if that matters.
content.html:
Just some thoughts about storing model using its human readable name:

  • Windows (assuming we intend to support this OS in the future) tend to have more restrictions on what characters are allowed in filenames so the human readable names will now be subject to these restrictions.

  • A few disk formats outside of the linux world are case insensitive so models with human readable names like My Model and my model will not be able to live side by side in the same directory - not sure if that matters.
